job.name: YADEJob
job.title: Managed File Transfer (including DMZ - Jump Host functionality).

note.p: Transfer argument: Path to the XML configuration file which contains the profiles to be executed.
Transfer argument: The profile_id of a profile to be executed.
Transfer argument: Overwrites .../SourceFileOptions/Selection/.../Directory of the current profile.
Transfer argument: Overwrites .../SourceFileOptions/Selection/.../ExcludedDirectories of the current profile.

Transfer argument: Overwrites .../SourceFileOptions/Selection/FilePathSelection/FilePath
of the current profile.

Transfer argument: Overwrites .../SourceFileOptions/Selection/FileSpecSelection/FileSpec
of the current profile.

Transfer argument: Overwrites .../SourceFileOptions/Selection/FileListSelection/FileList
of the current profile.
Transfer argument: Overwrites .../(Copy|Move)Target/Directory of the current profile.

Processing argument: Specifies how to handle placeholder variable names that can be specified for replacement in the configuration file.
Examples: <Directory>${PLACEHOLDER_VARIABLE}</Directory>
true
PLACEHOLDER_VARIABLE , placeholder_variable etc. are resolved regardless of case
false
only case-sensitive matches PLACEHOLDER_VARIABLE is resolved

Processing argument: Specifies how to handle placeholder variables that can be specified in the configuration file for replacement if the placeholder cannot be replaced.
Examples: <Directory>${PLACEHOLDER_VARIABLE}</Directory>
true
If a placeholder variable cannot be replaced, the original value is returned: ${PLACEHOLDER_VARIABLE}
false
If a placeholder variable cannot be replaced, an empty value is returned.

Processing argument: Execute operations in parallel.
Affects all operations that support parallel execution, including:
Copy and Move - parallel file transfer
Remove - parallel deletion from Source
Note: This value is ignored or automatically set to the default value of 1 if parallel execution is not supported by the Source or Target provider.
Serialized transfer result for File Transfer History.
